naslov: /// ZADAR - KOŽINO_dvokatnica_325 m2_4. RED_100 m od mora/// (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se izvanredna samostojeća dvokatnica netto površine od 325 m2 u Kožinu pokraj Zadra. Kuća iznimno kvalitetne gradnje iz 2002. god. čija površina iznosi 325 m2 nalazi se na mirnoj i vrlo povoljnoj lokaciji svega na 100 m udaljenosti od mora, a sastoji se od tri etaže: PRIZEMLJA I DVA KATA s unutarnjim stubištem obloženim mramorom. PRIZEMLJE površine od 103 m2 sastoji se od: - dvosobnog apartmana visoke kvalitete uređenja i opremanja koji sadrži: kuhinja/blagovaona, dnevni boravak, dvije (2) spavaće sobe, kupaona/WC i dvije (2) terase. - konobe sa ljetnom kuhinjom i kamenim kominom idealnim za ugodna druženja 1.KAT površine 111 m2 sastoji se od: - dvosobnog apartmana visoke kvalitete uređenja i opremanja koji sadrži: hodnik, kuhinja/blagovaona, dnevni boravak, dvije (2) spavaće sobe, kupaona/WC i terasa. - jednosobnog apartmana visoke kvalitete uređenja i opremanja koji sadrži: dnevni boravak, jedna (1) spavaća soba, kupaona/WC i terasa. 2.KAT površine 110 m2 sastoji se od: - prostranog jednosobnog apartmana visoke kvalitete uređenja i opremanja koji sadrži: hodnik, kuhinja/blagovaona, dnevni boravak, jedna (1) spavaća soba, kupaona/WC i dvije terase. - studio apartman visoke kvalitete uređenja i opremanja koji sadrži: dnevni/spavaći prostor i kupaona/WC. Svaki apartman je jedinstveno uređen i poptuno opremljenm,  te osim standardne opreme klime uređaja i sl., ovi apartmani imaju i parlafon. Sa terasa svih apartmana pruža se prekrasan pogled na more i zadarski arhipelag. Kuća se nalazi na mirnoj i vrlo povoljnoj lokaciji sa prilaznim putem do mora udaljenog svega 100 metara. Na terenu površine 500 m2 smještena je i garaža površine 40 m2. Uhodan posao sa turističkom djelatnošću i visoka popunjenost tijekom cijele sezone. Kuća se prodaje kompletno namještena. Papiri uredni, vlasništvo 1/1. Dostupno odmah. Tražena cijena kuće iznosi 750.000,00 EUR-a. Više info na: *** FRESTI NEKRETNINE*** Usluge koje pružamo besplatno za kupce: • vodimo postupak upisa posjeda/vlasništva kupca u katastar i zemljišne knjige • priprema predugovora i ugovora u suradnju s partnerskim odvjetničkim uredom • priprema kompletne dokumentacije za prijavu poreza na promet nekretnina • usluge prijenosa režija sa prodavatelja na kupca. ENG_____________________________________________________________________________________ For sale is a detached two-storey house in an extraordinary Kožino near Zadar from the sea only 100 meters. The house is extremely well built from 2002. whose area is 325 m2 situated on a quiet and very convenient location just 100 meters from the sea, and consists of three floors: three floors with internal staircase lined with marble. The ground floor area of 103 m2 consists of: - Two-bedroom apartments with high quality decoration and furnishing, which includes: kitchen / dining room, living room, two (2) bedrooms, bathroom / toilet and two (2) terraces. - Tavern with outdoor kitchen and stone fireplace ideal for cozy gatherings 1st floor area of 111 m2 consists of: - Two-bedroom apartments with high quality decoration and furnishing, which includes: entrance hall, kitchen / dining room, living room, two (2) bedrooms, bathroom / WC and terrace. - One-bedroom apartments with high quality decoration and furnishing, which comprises living room, one (1) bedroom, bathroom / WC and terrace. 2nd FLOOR of 110 m2 consists of: - A spacious one-bedroom apartments with high quality decoration and furnishing, which includes: entrance hall, kitchen / dining room, living room, one (1) bedroom, bathroom / WC and two terraces. - Studio apartment high quality decoration and furnishing, which comprises living / sleeping area and bathroom / WC. Each suite is uniquely decorated and completely opremljenm, and except as standard air conditioning, etc., These apartments have intercom. From the terrace of the apartment offers a breathtaking view of the sea and Zadar archipelago. The house is located in a quiet and very convenient location with access road to the sea which is only 100 meters. On a plot of 500 m2 is located in the garage area of 40 m2. Established business with tourist activity and high occupancy throughout the season. The house is sold fully furnished. Pantry, ownership 1/1. Available immediately. Asking price of the house is € 750,000.00-a. More info on: *** FRESTI NEKRETNINE*** The services we provide free of charge for customers: • lead the procedure for entering the estate / property buyer in the cadastre and land registry • preparation of preliminary agreements and contracts in collaboration with partner law firm • preparation of complete documentation for a tax on real estate • transmission services directed by the seller to the buyer
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Grijalice i radijatori na struju
